description.description: The description of the project. This description will be displayed to all users of the project. We recommend providing a brief description of the project and its intended purpose.

name.description: The name of the source repository. For more information about name requirements, see [Quotas for source repositories](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/codecatalyst/latest/userguide/source-quotas.html).

projectName.description:
The name of the project in the CodeCatalyst space.

The following arguments are optional:

spaceName.description: The name of the CodeCatalyst space.
